member.summary: Function for decode steganography from image
member.param: image source file. The image should be png, jpg and bmp format. Can be any bpp
Byte for file to hide in the sourceFile. This file can be any file type

member.summary: Method for encode steganography into image (sourceBitmap)
member.param: Source bitmap where we are going to encode the data
Name for the new image containing the steganography data. By default the new image will be a png file
Information we want to encode to the sourceBitmap
